name: puppet-apache_addfiles
author: saheba
description: This module is a little extension to example42/puppet-apache that enables you to connect more than just the *.conf-file handling to an apache module installation. It allows to add one or several files or file archives to a recipe that contains apache::module definition calls
summary: module to place one or more additional files (beside *.conf-files) required by an apache module and connect the placement of the additional files to the apache module package installation
